homePage.title: Home page
homePage.information:
Welcome!!!!!
On our website you can choose a special design that will make your whole event jump,
We will design the branding for you for the most perfect event possible,
After all the design is a very important part, and it is impossible Lose it,
want to reap compliments on your event?
Go to the website and write to us which design style you connected with, and we will make sure to provide you with the most perfect service,
a useful and enjoyable experience!!!

loginPage.title: Sign in
loginPage.invalidPassword: Password should be at least 8 characters long
loginPage.errorLoging: One of the data entered is incorrect

signUpPage.title: Sign up
signUpPage.invalidPassword: Password should be at least 8 characters long
signUpPage.errorMailExists: This email account already exists in the system, please enter a new email address

resetPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
resetPasswordPage.putEmail: To reset your password, please enter the email address you registered with.
resetPasswordPage.secMassage: Reset password link has been sent to your email

resetPasswordCarePage.title: Set new password
resetPasswordCarePage.invalidPassword: Password should be at least 8 characters long
resetPasswordCarePage.alertMessage: your password has been reset successfully

shoppingCartPage.title: Shopping Cart
shoppingCartPage.emptyCartMessage: Your cart is empty.To checkout add an item to your cart

footerPage.title: Footer page
footerPage.p1: We aim to provide you with the best gifts for every occasion.

productListPage.title: product List
productListPage.technicalIssue: Sorry, technical issue, try to relod your page
